notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: B.Y., Z.Z., H.C., J.F.-W.C and K.-Y.Y. conceived and designed the experiments; B.Y., Z.Z., G.C., J.O.-L.T., P.-M.L., and K.-H.S. performed the experiments; B.Y., Z.Z., H.C., J.O.-L.T., S.Y., C.C.-Y.Y., F.Y., R.Y.-T.K., K.-H.S., S.K.-P.L., J.F.-W.C. and K.-Y.Y. analyzed the data; S.Y., C.C.-Y.Y., R.Y.-T.K., S.K.-P.L., J.-F.W.C. and K.-Y.Y. contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools; B.Y., Z.Z., H.C., J.F.-W.C. and K.-Y.Y. wrote the paper, all authors revised and approved the final version of the manuscript.
